title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Las Vegas, NV | CSI DMC
text:
Las Vegas
Kristin Green
Associate Director of Sales, Las Vegas +1 702-955-6465 kristin.green@csi-dmc.com 45 Maleena Mesa Street Henderson, NV 89074
CSI DMC Vegas
Welcome to “The Entertainment Capital of the World”! From the famous nightlife and attractions of The Strip, to the desert beauty of the Grand Canyon, to the serenity of Lake Las Vegas, you can bet the CSI DMC Vegas team will unveil both the hidden and the famous treasures of the region. With a spacious convention center, the most AAA Five Diamond hotels in the world, and world class performances and restaurants, our team can create an experience that will open your eyes to the uncommon and exciting elements in Las Vegas. CSI DMC Vegas invites you to hold your program in the Brightest Spot on Earth!
